reference: Leighton, L. and J. Mincer, Labor Turnover and Youth Unemployment, in The Youth Labor Market Problem, R.B. Freeman and D.A. Wise, eds., University of Chicago Press, 1982.

Nickell, S., Estimating the Probability of Leaving Unemployment, Econometrica, September, 1979.
Mortensen, D. and G. Neumann, Interfirm Mobility and Earnings, Draft of DOL Report, Nov. 1984.
